groupbossbar.controls.bossUI.name: Toggle Group Boss Bar
groupbossbar.controls.bossUI.warn: No token selected. Please select one or multiple tokens and try again
groupbossbar.settings.currentHpPath.name: Current HP Path
groupbossbar.settings.currentHpPath.hint: Data path to the current hp of an actor
groupbossbar.settings.maxHpPath.name: Max HP Path
groupbossbar.settings.maxHpPath.hint: Data path to the max hp of an actor
groupbossbar.settings.barHeight.name: Boss Bar Height
groupbossbar.settings.barHeight.hint: Height of the boss bar in pixels
groupbossbar.settings.backgroundPath.hin: Image to be placed as the healthbar background
groupbossbar.settings.foregroundPath.hin: Image to be palced as the healthbar foreground, this image will be resized depending on hp %
groupbossbar.settings.textSize.name: Font Size
groupbossbar.settings.cameraPan.name: Pan Camera to Boss when creating the health bars
groupbossbar.settings.cameraPan.hint: When enabling the healthbars pan the camera to the token. When selecting multiple tokens the last one will be the one the camera pans to
groupbossbar.settings.tempBarColor.name: Temporary healthbar color
groupbossbar.settings.tempBarColor.hint: Set color for the temporary healthbar that shows when damage is taken
groupbossbar.settings.tempBarColor.label: Color Picker
groupbossbar.settings.position.name: Position
groupbossbar.settings.position.hint: Position of the boss bars. Webcam positioning options require webcams to be active.
